details: A global fast-food chain known for its wide variety of pizzas, sides, and desserts, specializing in quick delivery and carryout services.
A small team of web developers building hobby websites for fun! We integrate with the community to directly address feedback and implement requested features.
A coding boot camp offering part-time, flexible courses in web development, mobile development, and more.
I remotely taught multiple classes of students the fundamentals and advanced topics of modern web development including JavaScript, React, and NodeJS.
A digital production service offering end-to-end solutions, from ideation to deployment, focusing on rapid product development and continuous innovation.

An immersive coding boot camp offering full-time and part-time courses in web development, software engineering, and UX/UI design. Known for its hands-on approach and project-based learning, it helps students gain practical skills to launch tech careers.
